General.Name: Megapolitan Developments Tbk
General.Description: PT Megapolitan Developments Tbk operates as a property development company in Indonesia. The company engages in the development of shopping centers, housing projects, commercial shop houses, and shopping and business centers, as well as residential areas and apartments. It is also involved in renting properties and sale of land. The company was formerly known as PT Megapolitan Developments Corporation and changed its name to PT Megapolitan Developments Tbk in 2010. PT Megapolitan Developments Tbk was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Megapolitan Developments Tbk is a subsidiary of PT. Cosmopolitan Persada Developments.
General.Address: The Bellagio Residence & Mall, Jakarta, Indonesia, 12950
